title: innum enmanam (varaNam)
sahitya:
Innam en manam ariyAdavar pOla
Irundhidal nyAyamA yAdava mAdhavA 

anupallavi
 
Munnam payind'RadO innAdagamellAm
MannA kamalakkaNNA maNivaNNA 

ciTTai swara saahityam
 
parivilAda nenjam tandadAr pagaliravelAm
ninaindurugiyum
palavidandanilE ninaiyazhaittEn manam calittEn oru
tuNaiyilEn (Innam) 

caraNam
 
KuzhalUdum azhagA kaNNA kuRai tIrAyO

1
 
ULLum puRam engum  isai ponga vEyng  (kuzhal)

2

VeNNeyuNNum vAyA oLiyum mAyA kaLvanum nIyA
kanniyar nEyA
Kadir nigar tUyA un manam kAyA anbelAm
poyyAagamurugavE (kuzhal)

3

Muzhu madiyaikkaNDa
kaDalalai pOlavum kuLir mazhaiyil 
nanaiyum iLam payir pOlavum
Enadu uyirum uDalum uLamum hnegizha nI vandu'
manamuvandu' karam thandu' in (kuzhal)

4

KANum poRuLelAm unaiyand'ri vErEdum kANEn engum
malar vizhigalODu kuzhal asaiyumugam mayil iRagaNiyum
manamOhanA   Arugil nI varugavE taRunamE karuNai
puriyavE anburuvE
AruyirE vA ALavA akhilam maghizha pavazha idazh
pozhiyum (kuzhal)
